script:
;;第5話　タイトル：交錯
;;//背景：ケイオスリオン城内
# bgmfile "bgm266_267" "BgmLostRagnarokBattle001" 0
# script "lisp"
# background "300_devil_room"
# body 3103811
# pos 3103811 3
# scale 3103811 0.8 0
# mask 3103811 off
# alpha 3103811 0 0
# face 3103811 "surprise"
# body 3502411
# pos 3502411 4
# scale 3502411 0.8 0
# alpha 3502411 0 0
# mask 3502411 off
# face 3502411 "angry"
# body 3201711
# pos 3201711 4
# scale 3201711 0.8 0
# alpha 3201711 0 0
# mask 3201711 off
# face 3201711 "angry"
# body 3400811
# pos 3400811 2
# scale 3400811 0.8 0
# alpha 3400811 0 0
# mask 3400811 off
# face 3400811 "angry"
# body 3101311
# pos 3101311 2
# scale 3101311 0.8 0
# alpha 3101311 0 0
# face 3101311 "angry"
# body 3100211
# pos 3100211 3
# scale 3100211 0.8 0
# alpha 3100211 1 0
# brightness 3100211 0 0
# mask 3100211 off
;;//レーヴァテインがヤグルシ達を弾き飛ばす
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.6

# fadein "green" 0.5
# shake 0 0.5
# se "SE_10499"
# effectbody 7000 5 0 0
# effectstart 7000
# waitandnext 0.5

# shake 0 0.5
# alpha 3100211 0 0
# alpha 3201711 1 0
# alpha 3101311 1 0
# serif 0
# textwindow "normal"
# textboxarrow 0 3
# fadein "green" 0.5
# voice 320171 "yagurushi_a_battle_0008"
@ヤグルシ
きゃうっ！

# shake 0 0.5
# fadein "green" 0.5
# alpha 3201711 0 0
# voice 310131 "paracelsus_a_battle_0007"
# textboxarrow 0 1
@パラケルスス
ぐっ！

# shake 0 0.5
# fadein "green" 0.5
# alpha 3101311 0 0
# alpha 3502411 1 0
# alpha 3400811 1 0
# voice 340081 "otyinusu_a_battle_0008"
# textboxarrow 0 1
@オティヌス
う、くぅっ…

# shake 0 0.5
# fadein "green" 0.5
# alpha 3400811 0 0
# voice 350241 "saika_a_battle_0008"
# textboxarrow 0 3
@雑賀
がはぁっ！

# textwindow "close"
# fadeout "black" 1
# alpha 3502411 0 0.5
# waitandnext 1

# alpha 3103811 1 0
# fadein "black" 1
# waitandnext 1

# textwindow "nomal"
# voice 1038 "almace_0038"
# textboxarrow 0 2
@アルマス
えっ…？
なにが起きたの…

# alpha 3103811 0 0.5
# alpha 3100211 1 0.5
# brightness 3100211 1 1.5
# face 3100211 "sad"
# voice 310021 "revatein_ge_0013"
@？？？
この程度…はぁ…めんどくさい…
